alert.note: Alert for Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 10:39PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN WHEATLAND AND NORTH CENTRAL SWEET GRASS COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM MDT... At 1037 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles southwest of Harlowton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Wheatland and north central Sweet Grass Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also be occurring with this storm and may lead to ponding of water on roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Melville Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland
